name: Malware Attack
description:
This is just a prototype (and was made duing a game jam (but we couldn't upload it , so I publish it here))

(Be careful the sound level, it changes depending on the browser, so be careful when starting the game if you don't want to go deaf)

This game is about a gaming computer that Is “attacked” by some very dangerous malwares.

You have one of the best scores ? Well , you are in the leaderboard...

The main character in this game is a gaming computer, and the enemies are green bugs with CPUs on them, the objective is to dodge all the malwares that are on the screen, nothing difficult !

The only tactical of the game is using WASD  to control your character and moving it up, down, to the right, and to the left of the screen you can accelerate by  pressing Left Shift,, the malwares are pretty fast so it needs some rapidity and reflexes. Each 14 enemies, it gets faster.

There’s only one level : the desert. The landscape is a mix between nature (with cactus) and absolutely void (with the absence of objects in the desert).
